content.raw: I'm working on making your recommended changes. Quick question: You suggested that the ROS package name be updated to `husky_migration_config_0` without `_sensor_`, but the model does have an IMU and a lidar. Also, the launch variable contains `_SENSOR_`. I was hoping to keep the launch variable and the package name the same except capitalization. Is it okay to update it to `husky_migration_sensor_config_0`?
content.html: I'm working on making your recommended changes. Quick question: You suggested that the ROS package name be updated to husky_migration_config_0 without _sensor_, but the model does have an IMU and a lidar. Also, the launch variable contains _SENSOR_. I was hoping to keep the launch variable and the package name the same except capitalization. Is it okay to update it to husky_migration_sensor_config_0?
